name: Stichting Wageningen Research
goal: The strength of Wageningen UR lies in its ability to join the forces of specialised research institutes and Wageningen University. It also lies in the combined efforts of the various fields of natural and social sciences. This union of expertise leads to scientific breakthroughs that can quickly be put into practice and be incorporated into education. This is the Wageningen Approach
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Research and innovation in Horizon 2020, collaboration, capacity, demonstration and consultancy
